pageProduct.name: Travacalm Travel Sickness Original 10 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Travacalm Original

For the prevention of travel sickness.

Warnings

This medication may cause drowsiness. If affected, do not drive a vehicle of operate machinery. Avoid alcohol.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains: Dimenhydrate 50mg, Hyoscine hydrobromide 0.2mg, Caffeine 20mg.

Directions

Take 30 minutes before departure.

Adults: Take 1 or 2 tablets. Repeat four to six hourly if necessary (do not exceed 4 tablets in 24 hours).

Children:Repeat six to eight hourly if necessary (do not exceed three doses in 24 hours). 2 to 3 years: A quarter tablet; 4 to 7 years: A half tablet; 8 to 13years: One tablet; Not recommended for children under 2 years of age.
